title: Star Force: Trailblazer
description: With the trainees moving on through their training at an accelerated pace, the 'Challenges' branch out into new areas including land vehicles, aircraft, and space combat...meanwhile Director Davis advances Star Force into the next stage of its development with a radical and risky proposition to the nations of Earth."Trailblazer" is the 4th episode in the series.Word Count: 24,700
author: Aer-ki Jyr
